name: Bad Ink
description:
Se la oscuridad, mi pequeño y mono amigo!

Es hora de despertar y dominar la tierra pequeño, cazaremos a los humanos y sus peligrosos pies. Usa la oscuridad a tu favor para superar los puzzles, atrae con tu apariencia inocente a los incautos y dales amor, pero ten cuidado pues en la luz estarás indefenso.

    • W - D => Movimiento
    • E => Cazar
    • F => Dar amor <3
    • Space => Saltar

Be the cutest darkness, my little friend! 

Wake up, let's dominate the earth little bad boy, we will hunt humans but take care with his stomp. You must use the darkness like a ally to overcome puzzle, and you must  attract with your innocent appearance the unwarys and give them love, but be careful because in the light you will be impotent.

    • W - D => Movement
    • E => Hunt
    • F => Love <3
    • Space => Jump

Credits

  • Juan Francisco Mora (Programming / Unity integration) https://twitter.com/JfranMora
  • Sergio Font Gómez (2D / 3D Artist / Game Design) https://twitter.com/Bardolimo

This game was made in 48 for MalagaJamWeekend VIII
